name: Shadow Dream (gruebite)
description:
IN DEVELOPMENT

Play a shaman entering a Dreamworld engulfed by shadows.  Explore, survive, cast spells, and restore obelisks with lumenstones found around the world to win the game.

Windows executable provided if web client is too slow.

Controls

  • WASD Move in a direction
  • Tab  Toggle Glow
  • Q/E Decrease/increase Glow
  • 1/2/3/4 Cast spell or channel totemic spell

Credits

  • Base Palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/moonlight-15
  • Font: http://www.bay12forums.com/smf/index.php?topic=144897.0
  • Music: https://chiphead64.itch.io/dreamy-space-soundtrack
